heading.name: Hypertension
heading.definition: % of patient population, age 18 and older, with hypertension who received testing within the past 12 months, for any of the following: Blood glucose or HbA1C, BP measurement, Obesity/overweight screening.
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from CIHIâ€™s 2012 Indicator Technical Specifications (Nov 2012)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.A1C > 0 OR fin.bg > 0 OR fin.bp > 0 OR fin.bmi > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% Patients with LIPID, BP or BMI',
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.patient) - SUM( IF( fin.A1C > 0 OR fin.bg > 0 OR fin.bp > 0 OR fin.bmi > 0, 1, 0 ) ) ,0 ) AS '% Patients with no test'
FROM (
SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, BP.dataField AS bp, BG.dataField AS bg, BMI.dataField AS bmi, A1C.dataField AS A1C FROM demographic d INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
-- HbA1C LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.dataField, m.demographicNo FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code LIKE ${hba1c} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) A1C ON (d.demographic_no = A1C.demographicNo)
-- or Blood Glucose LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bloodGlucose} AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) BG ON (d.demographic_no = BG.demographicNo)
-- Blood Pressure LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bloodPressure} AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) BP ON (d.demographic_no = BP.demographicNo)
-- BMI Screening -- Look for BMI index or if the height and weight was measured. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dataField, demographicNo FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bmi} AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY demographicNo HAVING COUNT(demographicNo) > -1 ) BMI ON (d.demographic_no = BMI.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodes} AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ( ROUND( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), ${lowerLimit.date} ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1 ) fin

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code LIKE ${hba1c} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) A1C ON (d.demographic_no = A1C.demographicNo)
-- or Blood Glucose LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bloodGlucose} AND demographicNo > 0 AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) BG ON (d.demographic_no = BG.demographicNo)
-- Blood Pressure LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bloodPressure} AND demographicNo > 0 AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) BP ON (d.demographic_no = BP.demographicNo)
-- BMI Screening -- Look for BMI index or if the height and weight was measured. LEFT JOIN (
SELECT m1.id, m1.dataField, m1.demographicNo, m1.dateObserved FROM measurements m1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(id) AS id FROM measurements WHERE type LIKE ${bmi} AND demographicNo > 0 AND DATE(dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} GROUP BY demographicNo ) m2 ON (m1.id = m2.id)
) BMI ON (d.demographic_no = BMI.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} AND dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodes} AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ( ROUND( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), ${lowerLimit.date} ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) GROUP BY d.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(d.demographic_no) > -1
